alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 9:43PM EST until January 09 at 10:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 915 PM CST. * At 842 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Laurel Hill, or 10 miles northeast of Crestview, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Paxton, Gordon, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Gaskin, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale, Lakewood, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Flowersville, New Harmony and Piney Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
